data.message:
Meeting Ed Sheeran would mean everything to me as an aspiring songwriter/musician. He inspires myself, and I know he inspires so many other people to pick up an instrument and express yourself through music.
Songwriting and music is something which helps me get through every day and seems to be the only time I'm truly happy. I would love to meet Ed and ask him about tips and tricks and just tell him how much his work means to me.
Thank you for the opportunity
